title: Getting Started with React
content:
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. You can create reusable components and manage state effectively.

## Why React?
- Component-based architecture
- Great ecosystem
- Strong community

Start by running:

```bash
npx create-react-app my-app
```

Markdown Support in Blogs
content:
Our blog system supports **Markdown**, so you can format your text easily!

- Headings

Write naturally and it will render beautifully.
